nodes.text: The Zusi hypertunnel was a hyperspace route. By 3 ABY, the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk had pursued the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca in a breakneck chase along the plasma floes of the hypertunnel. Bossk was nearly successful in capturing the pair, but ultimately the class one generator of his YV-666 light freighter, Hound's Tooth, was shattered and his quarry escaped.
The Zusi hypertunnel was mentioned in "Tooth and Claw," a short story written by Michael Kogge and published in the From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back anthology in 2020.
